wikipedia_page.main: George Rosser Evans (6 October 1867 - ?) was an international rugby union half-back who played club rugby for Cardiff and international rugby for Wales. Rosser is notable for facing the touring New Zealand Māoris, the first touring Southern Hempishere rugby team, when they lost to Cardiff in 1888.

response: * Rosser Evans (George Rosser Evans, 1867–?), Wales international rugby union player
